metadata.raw:
Triumph Class Cruiser (Military Starship)

The Triumph class was designed as a flagship for an independent mercenary fleet, and built at Lunion in 1109. The high cost of heavy spacecraft puts them beyond the reach of almost all mercenary units, and the Lunion government showed little interest in a craft with such diversified capabilities when they were already heavily committed to the production of a specialized fleet escort in the same tonnage range. As a result, only two of these craft had been constructed by 1117--the Triumph and the Victory.

CraftID: Triumph Class Cruiser, TL13, MCr9801
